segments.text: What happened yesterday ? You forgot our date , didn â€™ t you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it rained hard all day and I had a bad cold , so I decided to stay home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You did ? But I tried to call you at least twenty times and nobody answered .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , the telephone lines were damaged by the storm . They repaired them yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did David do yesterday ? Did he and Judy go dancing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , they stayed home and played cards with the children .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And what did you do ? Did you play cards , too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I listened to records and studied , what did you do yesterday , Donald ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just told you , Debbie . I tried to call you twenty times !
segments.speaker: S2
